name: Desert Craft
description: Desert Craft- a futuristic sandbox where you can construct your own car for exploring new places and open more modules for a vehicle!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024MB dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
